name: Little-Tanks
description:
Little Tanks is a little Unity game I made in a weekend and a bit where two players control two tiny tanks battling it out on a playroom floor. Both players play on the same keyboard.

Battle it out with your friends on one of 6 maps (maybe more to come) and download it for when you're on the move and don't have the internet but still want to chase down your friend.

Controls

Control - P1 - P2

Turn Left - A - Left Arrow

Turn Right - D - Right Arrow

Move Forwards - W - Up Arrow

Move Back - S - Down Arrow

Fire - Space - Right Ctrl

Feedback and comments are welcome!
